attributes.action: to outlaw organisations exploiting students and unemployed by offering unpaid work in the form of internships or work experience
attributes.additional_details:
The government should put legislation in place to stop large businesses and other organisations un-fairly exploiting students and the unemployed by offering un-paid work with no expenses or other costs reimbursed.

It is wholly unfair that hard-working and enthusiastic individuals are being made fools of by working for free and action needs to be taken.
